RelatedSentence: - Col. Ahron Hakimi , 311th Expeditionary Sustainment Command support operations chief , represented the 311th ESC at the 55th Annual Armed Forces Observance in Torrance , Calif .
On this day , the Navy took the lead as Rear Adm. Patrick Lorge served as the Grand Marshall .
On this day , the Navy took the lead as Rear Adm. Patrick Lorge served as the Grand Marshall .
The city of Torrance is one of few cities nationwide sanctioned by the Department of Defense to honor our Armed Forces through an annual Armed Forces Day Parade and Celebration .
Its parade has the distinction of being the nation 's longest running military parades sponsored by any city .
Its parade has the distinction of being the nation 's longest running military parades sponsored by any city .
Members of all five services stood at attention while the grand marshal , Rear Adm. Lorge , gave a spirited speech , saying that this was a great day to honor all U.S. military service personnel .
Members of all five services stood at attention while the grand marshal , Rear Adm. Lorge , gave a spirited speech , saying that this was a great day to honor all U.S. military service personnel .
This was where hundreds of recruits from all five services enjoyed hot food , but more than that , 800 recruits were sworn in a mass ceremony .
At a mid-day luncheon , U.S. Congresswoman Maxine Waters made a passionate speech , thanking all the veterans who have served this great nation .
At a mid-day luncheon , U.S. Congresswoman Maxine Waters made a passionate speech , thanking all the veterans who have served this great nation .
Hundreds of people lined Torrance Boulevard as honored dignitaries , high school and military bands played , while veterans past and present strolled down the avenue .
Honored earlier in the week by President Barack Obama , when he reached the official bandstand , the crowd stood and applauded .
When he tried to exit his designated vehicle , the car door was stuck .
When he tried to exit his designated vehicle , the car door was stuck .
A cool breeze blew over the event , making it a perfect day .
